text:
e="preserve">Robert "Bob" Lynn Carroll (May 5, 1938 – April 8, 2020) was an American–Canadian vertebrate paleontologist. His works focused on Paleozoic and Mesozoic amphibians and reptiles. He was born in Kalamazoo, Michigan.
Carroll died on April 8, 2020 in Westmount, Quebec from COVID-19, aged 81.
